text: Both self promotion and a platform tip. really enjoyed using Reedsy to create manuscript for my book on careers in advertising/memoir and used it also t o find book cover designer and other services. now i'm on their Discovery (like Goodreads). Would love help to get some UPVOTES on my book to try to get in their newsletter. you might have to have a free account to upvote but it's a great (free) service if you're a writer or plan to make a book so not a total waste of time.  <https://reedsy.com/discovery/book/bronze-seeks-silver-lessons-from-a-creative-career-in-marketing-mat-zucker#preview>

attachments.title: Bronze Seeks Silver: Lessons from a Creative Career in Marketing by Mat Zucker
attachments.text: Synopsis: Marketing was destiny for Mat Zucker — the perfect cocktail of creativity, art and salesmanship. But before becoming chief creative officer of the world’s largest direct marketing agency and now partner at a global management consultancy, he had to pay his dues. Firs...
attachments.fallback: Discovery: Bronze Seeks Silver: Lessons from a Creative Career in Marketing by Mat Zucker

elements.text: Both self promotion and a platform tip. really enjoyed using Reedsy to create manuscript for my book on careers in advertising/memoir and used it also t o find book cover designer and other services. now i'm on their Discovery (like Goodreads). Would love help to get some UPVOTES on my book to try to get in their newsletter. you might have to have a free account to upvote but it's a great (free) service if you're a writer or plan to make a book so not a total waste of time.
